entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a way to delete symbols with native AOT #89686
  • JIT produces different asm from IL emit than from source #89685
  • Add `DOTNET_JitStdOutDirectory` to separate JitDisasm/JitDump outputs #89683
    Future
  • NativeAOT Windows - System.InvalidCastException: Specified cast is not valid #89672
  • [browser] V8 System.Text.Json.Tests AOT assert - loader.c:1821, condition not met #89670
    8.0.0
  • Pause timers on debug pause #89669
  • [API Proposal]: Ability to convert ValueTask<T> to ValueTask #89667
  • Span<byte> from local variable bug in .net 7.x Release #89666
    8.0.0
  • Failure in Mono run of System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #89661

Closed

  • `PublishAot` should have better error messages when cross-compiling #88942
    8.0.0
  • [QUESTION] How to reboot the system when computer is locked? #89677
  • HttpListener.Getcontext() not working on linux. #89671
  • ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics uses AttachCurrentThread #89649
  • [wasm][node] Test failures on System.Net.Http.Functional #86326
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: superpmi-collect consistently fails to fully collect crossgen2 scenarios #88423
    8.0.0
  • StreamReader.Peek() on a DeflateStream returns -1 early #68983
    8.0.0
  • SqlServer.Types regressed on .NET 7 #75455
    8.0.0
  • msbuild segfault on arm64 linux package restore #76039
    8.0.0
  • Intermittent failure in CriticalFinalizer test #76041
    8.0.0
  • Cloud Native: Improve Startup and workingset for Trimmed WebApp #80388
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [browser] fix loading assets #89687
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary assignments of `MSBuildAllProjects`. #89684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use cgroup to calculate available memory #89682
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DAC GetFlags() function for SOS #89679
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update gcinfo for arm64 mrs instruction #89678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] remove active issue 77334 #89676
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #89673
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Superpmi collect asyncio fix #89663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bugfix/27769 fix invalid output of readonlysequence tryget #89662
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Merged

  • Rename UnrollEqualsStartsWIth to UnrollEqualsStartsWith #89656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [7.0 port] #89053
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.11
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [6.0 port] #88486
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.21
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable new analyzer CA1868: 'Unnecessary call to 'Contains' for sets' and fix findings #89652
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable MacCatalyst too in PalCreateDump.cpp #89665
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [nodejs][http] remove active issue 86326 #89588
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fix ABI and Interop issues with InlineArray types #89519
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove _isBlocked constraint from StreamReader.Peek() #89609
    area-System.IO
  • Use new name of the ignorelist switch. #89643
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix Globalization Invariant string comparisons with ordinal ignore casing #89660
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Optimize some Vector usage patterns in morph #89506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Gracefully handle managed exceptions during replay #89654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2232021 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Move the IsLeft/IsRight decision out of the loop and use computed substring set #88516
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add more verifications in EventPipe rundownvalidation test. #89623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Read `AssetTraitValue` to get culture for resource during webcil transformation #89600
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement `System.Linq.Expressions` substitutions according to the recent refactoring #89638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix Windows static build to not export MONO_API symbols. #89642
    area-Build-mono
  • Use latest ILC to AOT-compile ILC #89655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Fix space, equal for name/value and Indirect Value #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add Unsafe.IsAddressLess/GreaterThanOrEqualTo methods #89156
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] CI: Don't run chrome debugger tests on runtime-wasm if they #89658
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [Perf] Cache key size in CngKey #89599
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Gather optimization info through the DAC #89534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
